text: i saw the world champion in the cycling who's 81 whose metabolic parameters were those of someone in their 30s healthy active so this is incredibly inspiring now in fairness were they a professional athlete in their 20s and 30s never and this is what struck me he was a smoker hypertensive and he started cycling because he needed to change his lifestyle in his 40s what i take away from that as well is the benefits and the more the importance of compounding and it speaks to why this level of training should be thought of in the same way that you think of accumulating wealth it's it's day in and day out small compounded gains over years and years and years is why a 40 year old overweight smoker can become a world champion at 80
title: Fitness Inspiration — A Healthy Life at Any Age #shorts
